items.name: Component_AnimationExecutor
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_AnimationExecutor
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_AnimationExecutor extends gs.Component
    ###*
    * An animation-handler component allows a UI game object to execute
    * a flow of animations. For more information about UI animations, see help-file.
    * 
    * @module ui
    * @class Component_AnimationExecutor
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof ui
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * @property initialized
        * @type boolean
        * @protected
        ###
        @initialized = no
        
        ###*
        * @property waitCounter
        * @type number
        * @protected
        ###
        @waitCounter = 0
        
        ###*
        * @property pointer
        * @type number
        * @protected
        ###
        @pointer = 0
        
        @repeat = no
        
    ###*
    * Initializes the animation-handler.
    * 
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        @initialized = yes
   
        return null
    
    execute: (animation, callback) ->
        @animation = animation
        @callback = callback
        @pointer = 0
        @waitCounter = 0
        
    stop: ->
        @animation = null
        
    ###*
    * Starts the specified animation.
    * 
    * @method startAnimation
    * @param {Object} animation - The animation to start.
    * @param {gs.Object_Base} target - The target object of the animation.
    * @protected
    ###    
    startAnimation: (animation, duration, target, animator) ->
        switch animation.type
            when "sound"
                AudioManager.playSound(animation.sound)
            when "maskTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                mask = { value: animation.value, graphic: { name: animation.mask }, vague: animation.vague, sourceType: 0 }
                animator.maskTo(mask, duration, easing)
            when "changeImages"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.changeImages(animation.images, duration, easing)
            when "playAnimation"
                record = RecordManager.animations[animation.animationId]
                if record?
                    animator.playAnimation(record)
            when "changeTo"
                value = ui.Component_BindingHandler.fieldValue(target, animation.value)
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                
                animator.change(value, animation.field, duration, easing)
            when "blendTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.blendTo(animation.opacity, duration, easing)
            when "colorTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.colorTo(Color.fromArray(animation.color), duration, easing) 
            when "tintTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.tintTo(Tone.fromArray(animation.tone), duration, easing) 
            when "moveTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.moveTo(animation.position[0], animation.position[1], duration, easing)
            when "rotate"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.rotate(0, animation.speed, duration, easing)
            when "rotateTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.rotateTo(animation.angle, duration, easing)
            when "moveBy"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.moveBy(@object.dstRect.x + animation.position[0], @object.dstRect.y + animation.position[1], duration, easing)
            when "zoomTo"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.zoomTo(animation.zoom[0] / 100, animation.zoom[1] / 100, duration, easing)
            when "scroll"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.scroll(animation.speed[0], animation.speed[1], 0, easing)
            when "move"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.move(animation.speed[0], animation.speed[1], duration, easing)
            when "shake"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                return animator.shake({ x: animation.range[0], y: animation.range[1] }, animation.speed, duration, easing)
            when "appear"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.appear(target.dstRect.x, target.dstRect.y, animation.animation, easing, duration)
            when "disappear"
                easing = if animation.easing then gs.Easings.fromString(animation.easing) else null
                animator.disappear(animation.animation, easing, duration)
        
        if @object.visual
            @object.visual.update() if duration == 0
        else if @object.behavior
            @object.behavior.update() if duration == 0

    ###*
    * Processes the animation flow.
    * 
    * @method processAnimation
    * @param {Object} descriptor - The animation-descriptor containing the animation-flow.
    * @protected
    ### 
    processAnimation: ->
        while @animation and @pointer < @animation.flow.length
            animation = @animation.flow[@pointer]
            @pointer++
            
            if animation.executed then continue
            
            if(!@object.animator)
                @object.animator = new gs.Component_Animator()
                @object.addComponent(@object.animator)
                
            duration = ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(@object, animation.duration || 0, yes)
            @startAnimation(animation, duration, @object, @object.animator)
            animation.executed = yes
            
            if animation.wait
                if animation.type?
                    @waitCounter = duration
                else
                    @waitCounter = animation.wait #ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(@object, animation.wait || 0, yes)
                break
                
        return null
                
    ###*
    * Updates the animations.
    * 
    * @method updateAnimations
    ###
    updateAnimation: ->
        if @waitCounter > 0
            @waitCounter--
            return
        
        if @pointer >= @animation.flow.length
            @pointer = 0
            @callback?(@object)
            if !@repeat
                @animation = null
            
        @processAnimation(@animation) if @animation
            
        return null
     
    ###*
    * Updates the animation-handler.
    * 
    * @method update
    ###   
    update: ->
        @object.needsUpdate = yes
        @updateAnimation() if @animation
        
ui.Component_AnimationExecutor = Component_AnimationExecutor
